text: A fantastic call. I learned a huge amount of practical and valuable information. I now have a clear, structured plan towards my interviews.

author: Ca
text: I took multiple sessions with Rupesh and have consistently been impressed by his deep expertise in DevOps and the AWS cloud domain. His background in development provides a solid foundation that enhances his ability to explain complex concepts clearly and effectively. He is genuinely passionate about his work and goes above and beyond to support his students ‚Äî often adjusting his schedule to accommodate individual needs. He takes the time to ensure your queries are thoroughly addressed and is always willing to provide guidance. This is not just a one-time engagement for him; he brings a long-term mentorship mindset to his coaching. I highly recommend him for coaching in Java, DevOps, Cloud (AWS), and SRE domains.
reply: Thank you so much for sharing this detailed feedback. I‚Äôm glad the sessions gave you clarity on DevOps and AWS concepts ‚Äî and that my development background added value to our discussions. I always aim to keep explanations practical and grounded so you can apply them right away. Your words about long-term mentorship mean a lot. I believe growth in tech isn‚Äôt just about passing one interview, but building confidence and depth over time. Happy to know that came through in our sessions. Appreciate your recommendation ‚Äî and I look forward to seeing you continue growing in Java, DevOps, Cloud, and SRE.

author: Shiv
text: I had the opportunity to interview with Rupesh for the Senior Site Reliability Engineer role. The session was very engaging, he created a comfortable environment that allowed me to share my experiences openly. His questions were thoughtful and well-structured, focusing not only on technical depth but also on collaboration, ownership, and leadership, which made the conversation meaningful. He actively listened, gave me the space to explain my stories in detail, and probed deeper in a constructive way. Overall, I found him professional, approachable, and genuinely interested in assessing both technical and cultural fit.
reply: Thanks, Shiv ‚Äî glad the session helped you sharpen both the technical and leadership side of your prep. I focus on making candidates comfortable and pushing them to think like bar-raisers. Wishing you the best with Google ‚Äî and for others reading, if you want the same level of prep, let‚Äôs connect.

text: This was my >2 times with Rupesh for mock interview! I had the opportunity to work with Rupesh to prepare for a panel session for a Solutions Architect role.
